porise.model.algorithms.cmab.NeuralTS¶

class porise.model.algorithms.cmab.NeuralTS(n_arms, hidden_size=20, n_layers=2, learning_rate=0.01, epochs=1, use_cuda=False, p=0.0, arm_feat_dim=0, user_feat_dim=0, out_size=1, memory_capacity=1000000.0, batch_size=128, confidence_multiplier=- 1.0, return_list=True)¶

Neural Thompson Sampling

Parameters
n_arms: int

Number of arms

return_list: bool

True: return the list of predicted logits of each arm False: return the index of the arm which has the largest logit

References

Zhang, Weitong, Dongruo Zhou, Lihong Li, and Quanquan Gu. “Neural Thompson Sampling.”(2020).

Methods

default_prediction()

Might be Used when user features not ready. Due to the following reasons

get_approximator_dim()

Sum of the dimensions of all trainable layers in the network.

predict(arm_feat_list)

Predict rewards/logits for each arm To be defined in children classes.

reset()

Initialize variables of policy To be defined in children classes.

reset_Ainv()

Initialize n_arms square matrices representing the inverses of exploration bonus matrices.

train(action_list, arm_feat_list, reward_list)

Train neural network

update_Ainv
porise.model.algorithms.cmab.HybridLinUCB.train porise.model.algorithms.cmab.NeuralTS.default_prediction
